attributes.name: Interactive Terminal Spawned via Perl v100.0.0
attributes.description: Identifies when a terminal (tty) is spawned via Perl. Attackers may upgrade a simple reverse shell to a fully interactive tty after obtaining initial access to a host.
author: Elastic
attributes.query:
event.category:process and event.type:(start or process_started) and process.name:perl and
  process.args:("exec \"/bin/sh\";" or "exec \"/bin/dash\";" or "exec \"/bin/bash\";")
